name: CruxEX 64 bit Linux Live CD/USB
short_description:
CruxEX 3.1 64 bit 2015 Linux Live CD/USB is based on CRUX 3.1 (latest version, released 140716), which is all Linux enthusiasts/nerds favorite OS.

Two versions!  

FEATURES
CruxEX 3.1 2015 uses the LXDE Desktop environment  and kernel 4.0.2-x86_64-cruxex with support for "extra everything". CruxEX 3.1 can be installed to a USB pen drive. After that you can install the system to hard disk (if you want). You can install to a USB stick in two different ways. While installing CruxEX to hard disk you can use Grub2 as startup manager.

NOTE ABOUT THE OLD VERSION OF CruxEX
I have kept the old version of CruxEX (CruxEX 32bit version 20121116) on the server. People with older computers (32bit) may like it. CruxEX 2.8 32bit also uses the LXDE Desktop environment. 

NEWS 150511 
Install my new version of CruxEX 3.1 64bit to a USB Pen Drive and save your system changes - read this INSTRUCTION: http://cruxex.exton.net/cruxex-3.1-pen-drive 

READ MORE
http://cruxex.exton.net
summary: CruxEX 3.1 64 bit 2015 Linux Live CD/USB is based on CRUX 3.1
